name: MobyGames - Neo-MobyDark
description: Similar (but not identical) to the old MobyDark skin that used to be selectable from the MobyGames user preferences. Try this if you miss it, or if you just prefer light-on-dark. As of Feb 2014, the site design is in a state of change, so I hope to maintain updates accordingly.
additional_info:
2018-09-15: Green stuff in submission wizard (auto populate notice) is less ugly
2018-09-10: STILL ALIVE BABY! now plays nice with new navigation bar
2016-08-16: handle thumbnails for promo art and such
2015-09-06: screenshot view fix: crisp scaling option now applies only if the image is scaled *up*
2015-05-08: screenshot view UI revamp + added option for better screenshot scaling

discussions.name: Praise for crisp scaling plus humble inquiry for improved previous/next click zones

style_setting_options.label: Crisp (NEW!)
